description: Reranks the relevance of sources based on queries. For more information, see Improve the relevance of query responses with a reranker model.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: An array of objects, each of which contains information about a query to submit to the reranker model. (dict) --- Contains information about a query to submit to the reranker model. Contains information about a text query. text (string) --- The text of the document. The type of the query.

nested_params.name: textQuery
nested_params.description: Contains information about a text query.

parameters.name: rerankingConfiguration
parameters.description: Contains configurations for reranking. Contains configurations for an Amazon Bedrock reranker. Contains configurations for a reranker model. additionalModelRequestFields (dict) --- A JSON object whose keys are request fields for the model and whose values are values for those fields. (string) --- (document) --- The ARN of the reranker model. numberOfResults (integer) --- The number of results to return after reranking. The type of reranker that the configurations apply to.

nested_params.name: bedrockRerankingConfiguration
nested_params.description: Contains configurations for an Amazon Bedrock reranker.

nested_params.name: modelConfiguration
nested_params.description: Contains configurations for a reranker model.

nested_params.name: additionalModelRequestFields
nested_params.description: A JSON object whose keys are request fields for the model and whose values are values for those fields.

nested_params.name: modelArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the reranker model.

nested_params.name: numberOfResults
nested_params.description: The number of results to return after reranking.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of reranker that the configurations apply to.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: An array of objects, each of which contains information about the sources to rerank. (dict) --- Contains information about a source for reranking. Contains an inline definition of a source for reranking. jsonDocument (document) --- Contains a JSON document to rerank. textDocument (dict) --- Contains information about a text document to rerank. text (string) --- The text of the document. The type of document to rerank. The type of the source.

nested_params.name: inlineDocumentSource
nested_params.description: Contains an inline definition of a source for reranking.

nested_params.name: jsonDocument
nested_params.description: Contains a JSON document to rerank.

nested_params.name: textDocument
nested_params.description: Contains information about a text document to rerank.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of document to rerank.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than can fit in the response, use this token in the nextToken field when making another request to return the next batch of results.

nested_items.name: results
nested_items.description: An array of objects, each of which contains information about the results of reranking.

nested_items.name: jsonDocument
nested_items.description: Contains a JSON document to rerank.

nested_items.name: textDocument
nested_items.description: Contains information about a text document to rerank.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of document to rerank.

nested_items.name: index
nested_items.description: The ranking of the document. The lower a number, the higher the document is ranked.

nested_items.name: relevanceScore
nested_items.description: The relevance score of the document.
